name: Sans Embûches Team 9
description:
Story :

   Sans Embûches is a 2D top view rhythmic runner. Where you embody a log of wood desperately trying to escape the sharp teeth of a sawmill.

 Gameplay :

 Your mission is to get out of the sawmill by avoiding obstacles and avoiding being caught by the saws. You will have to press, hold down, stay down and press different keys several times in a row while keeping in rhythm.

 

Controls :

 

PC: The player will have to press the directional arrows that corresponds to the screen while paying attention to how to press it.

 

Xbox: The player will have to press the colored key that corresponds to the screen while paying attention to the way to press it.

 

Our Team
